pros: Teaching here is great, it feels like it is a growing institucion and you have all the basic needs in place. Housing and bills are usually offered. If moving to South Korea is appealing to you, the job is satisfying.
cons: The location isn't the best, as it is far from Seoul and a bit secluded from Incheon which is the first city.

pros: Good, easy jobs, meeting new people, chill
cons: Didn't get paid and had to work until late sometimes
